full_summary:
# TBIPS SA – Business Transformation Architect – Level 3

## About the Tender

The Courts Administration Service (CAS) is seeking to establish a contract with a professional services firm to support its digital transformation and delivery of strategic objectives. Specifically, they require four (4) Business Transformation Architects at Level 3 to support their digital transformation on an as-and-when-required basis.

## Mandatory Requirements

* A minimum of four (4) Business Transformation Architects at Level 3 with expertise in various areas of expertise.
* Submission of a bid for all four resources.
* The work is currently not being performed by a contracted resource.
* Security Requirement: Common PS SRCL #19 applies.
* Minimum Corporate Security Required: Designated Organization Screening (DOS).
* Minimum Resource Security Required: Enhanced Reliability.

## Additional Information

* Contract Authority: Marco Pelchat, Consultant, Procurement (613-315-7390, [Procurement.Approvisionnement@cas-satj.gc.ca](mailto:Procurement.Approvisionnement@cas-satj.gc.ca))
* Inquiries: Inquires regarding this RFP requirement must be submitted to the Contracting Authority.
* Language: Documents may be submitted in either official language.
* Method of Supply: Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) Method of Supply.

## Important Details

* This RFP is a Request for Proposal.
* The procurement method is competitive and selective tendering.
* The trade agreements that apply are:
	+ Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
	+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
	+ World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* The regions of opportunity are: Canada
* The regions of delivery are: National Capital Region (NCR)

## Contact Information

* Email: [Procurement.Approvisionnement@cas-satj.gc.ca](mailto:Procurement.Approvisionnement@cas-satj.gc.ca)
* Phone: 613-315-7390
* Address: 90 Sparks Street, Room 940, Ottawa, ON K1A 0H9, Canada

Note: Please refer to the attached documents for the full RFP. [1](https
